channel.description:
Hello, Bootstrappers!
Iâ€™m JP, a developer, and entrepreneur. Iâ€™m originally from France but I've settled at Montreal 7 years ago now.
During the day, I'm a developer at a SaaS company I've co-founded. I'm also making side projects that I hope one day will also be a great SaaS tool one day.
My latest side project is called [Docbrew](https://docbrew.com/), it's a tool for small and medium businesses to create invoices! I've got many ideas but I'm taking my time to learn about validation. ðŸ¤“
My quick todo list: - Improve the landing page - Validate, exchange with interested people. - get users
I look forward to exchanging with you!
JP
